articles.author: Abid Hussain
articles.title: Pakistan says ‘India proxies’ behind Islamabad bombing: What we know so far - Al Jazeera
articles.description: ‘Suicide’ blast at court complex kills 12, injures more than 30, a day after a deadly explosion in the Indian capital.
articles.content:
Islamabad, Pakistan  Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif has blamed India for the suicide attack that struck outside the district and sessions court building in Islamabad on Tuesday afternoon.
